about:
Heyo! If you see me playing feel free to say hi! I love sports and playing MC (duh). If I am not playing MC then I am probably outside playing sports, hanging out with my friends, and/or reading. I have been playing the violin since I was four. I have trouble keeping my hands still, so I took up drumming also! I am not a nerd (hopefully). I have a black belt in Martial Arts (not lying for all you haters out there :P). I have one bassett hound puppy named Fletcher, he turned one on September 5. I am not really good at writing about myself :/. Sadly, I won't be able to play much during the school year with sports and class :(. I will try to play as much as I can! See you on Avicus! biiiiiiiiiii
Free Counters
interests: soccer, lacrosse, tennis, basketball, shooting real guns and bows, and reading
